about_the_game:
Voice Drama

◆Warning◆
This voice drama is only available in Japanese.



This data is a compilation of voice dramas for the purchase bonus of "Sexaul Massage Shop - AKARI -".
The voice drama includes the following contents.

Normal version mp3 data
Sexaul-Massage-Shop-AKARI-Initial-Offer.mp3
Sexaul-Massage-Shop-AKARI-Steam-exclusive-offers.mp3


wav data for high sound quality
Sexaul-Massage-Shop-AKARI-Initial-Offer.wav
Sexaul-Massage-Shop-AKARI-Steam-exclusive-offers.wav


Please use the high sound quality data to convert to formats other than mp3.


◆Content Warning

This hois drama contains content not suitable for all ages,
may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace.

general adult content.
